title: POWER CUTS : 3-hours & 40 minutes daily on 19th, 20th, 21st May
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka has approved power cuts for a period of 3 hours and 40 minutes daily from 19th to the 21st of May.
POWER CUTS : 3-hours & 40 minutes daily on 19th, 20th, 21st May
Ranil offers olive branch to Sajith to work together on addressing drug shortage
